Hey, I'm Zinzy Waleson, a person online and in Amsterdam. This here is a quiet street of the Internet where I come to link and think. I'm a researcher and designer making tools for people at work. Learn more about me, this website or what I'm up to now, say hello, or visit the archive.

Overconnectedness

Overconnectedness

A state that develops when Iâ€™m so well-exposed to the every-day lives of other people that I not only lose my curiosity about their lives, but that I in fact begin to consciously or subconsciously seek to receive less information about them.

  • Humans begin expecting from one another that theyâ€™re up-to-date on each otherâ€™s feeds
  • Someone commenting on / making jokes about another personâ€™s late response to a post
  • Perceiving only the highlight reel parts of friendsâ€™ lives
